issues.code: hostControl.Visible = false; // Prevent painting of empty DockHosts before panels are docked
issues.description: CRITICAL: DockingHostFactory hostControl visibility blocker - Sets Visible=false which prevents panels from rendering
issues.fix: Remove this line or set to 'true' after panels are docked

issues.description: MainForm.Docking.cs does NOT use DockingHostFactory - creates panels directly
issues.fix: Consider migrating to DockingHostFactory.CreateDockingHost for consistency and testability
